instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3476: What is 820-3476? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Only safe boot works
threads.message:
Hello 

I m working on <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a  few months ago liquid damaged and cleaned by another service. Board worked 1 week only then stopped .

Machine working only safe mode (when you press shift key machine booting) other way when you see desktop or login screen freeze computer.

Tested known good , OS with external and internal disks , keyboard,trackpad, battery.

I can install OS without problem but when start to login screen freeze again.. 

When checked board saw bios touched some one so tried 3 different bios with my older used file (also clean me bios ) 

ASD starting freeze restart computer:( 

Any idea about this situation ...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3476</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Only safe boot works
threads.message: Safe mode working would suggest it is a device driver hanging the system. Remove everything not needed for booting and try booting the bare board. Check corrosion around CPU Vcore supply and SMC.
